name: mri_gcab_train
description: Previously used command in FreeSurfer for training with Gaussian Classifier Atlas-based (GCAB) modeling; has been removed in the current version.
author: FreeSurfer Developers

inputs.description: Command has been removed from the current version of FreeSurfer. For further information, please contact the support mailing list.
inputs.name: Removed Command Info
inputs.default-value: mri_gcab_train has been removed from this version of freesurfer.
